Posts.Content: Jan 15, 2011 02:17PM Sylvia62 wrote: OK - contrary to my wanting to believe it - my chemo starts Jan. 19, 2011.  I had a wire lumpectomy.  It is Stage 1, invasive ductal carcinoma,, not in the lymph nodes and not hormone-related.  I had the week of radiation - thing inserted in my breast - so we could do it twice a day for one week.  Done!  At least I thought I was.  Now my oncologist says I should do 20 weeks of chemo - because it is not hormone-related and is "aggressive."  SO - my first 8 weeks are of Adriamycin (Doxorubicin) - infusion every other week.  Then we switch to Taxol - but I don't know know often.  So - I will be thankful for your tips and encouragement! I am hoping to work as much as possible during this 20 weeks - is that possible?! Thanks for any and all comments...............
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in January '11 JulieH leftfootforward
